title: Introducing: Alexander Biggs
content:
Alexander Biggs popped up on my radar earlier this year, but it wasn’t until a few days ago that I really gave his tracks a proper listen, and pretty glad I did.

 With a debut single that clocked up an impressive 1/4mil streams on Spotify, it’s his latest track, Tidal Wave, that really sets up a project to truly believe in. Whilst the songwriting leans more toward the likes of Ben Howard and Keaton Henson, there’s a more distinctive rawness to the sound that allows it to remain firmly grounded, and all the better for it. Check out Tidal Wave below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
